messages.text: Hello, how can I assist you today?
I'm looking for information on how to use the chatbot.
You can ask me anything, and I will try my best to help.
Good day! What can I do for you today?
I need help with integrating AI into my app.
I can guide you through the steps of integrating AI services.
Hi! How can I assist you?
Can you tell me how to use this dashboard?
Sure! This dashboard lets you manage your AI chats and explore various features.
Hello! How can I help you today?
I need help with managing my tasks.
You can create tasks in the 'Task Manager' section and set deadlines.
